bug.author: habibutsu
bug.description:
After downloading version v1.2.0 - Linux/ Blocks.zip and running following code: <denchmark-code>client = CarClient() client.confirmConnection() client.enableApiControl(True) client.getCarState() </denchmark-code>
I getting following error RPCError: rpclib: server could not find function 'getCarState' with argument count 1.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/habibutsu>@habibutsu</denchmark-link> This is an interesting error. At first try, I am not able to replicate it. Which Linux operating system are you using?
Maybe I can enable debug mode, verbose level for logging or something else for investigate this problem?
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/habibutsu>@habibutsu</denchmark-link> do you still have this issue with the new airsim version?

Closed due to age and incompleteness. Please feel free to open a new issue if you still have this problem, and include the following (as requested when opening a bug issue) *Make sure to write all reproduction steps *Include full error message in text form *Search issues for error message before filing issue *Attach screenshot if applicable *Include code to run if applicable Thanks!
